testnet.modal.title: Welcome to the Snekkiest Testnet
testnet.modal.description.1.text: We are dedicated to continue improving Basilisk. Thank you for helping us by participating in the testnet.
testnet.modal.description.2.text: While we have a strict no-cookies policy on mainnet, our testnet app does use 🍪.
testnet.modal.description.3.text: This is required by <0>Sentry.io</0> which collects certain non-sensitive data such as OS and browser info.
testnet.modal.description.4.text: If you agree to this, please click Yess, let me enter, otherwise click No, take me back.
